FuncDef:
The filter command creates a filter for a sampling path and displays the filter view.
The undo filter command deletes a filter configured for a sampling path. The filter command creates a filter for a sampling path and displays the filter view. The undo filter command deletes a filter configured for a sampling path. By default, no filter is created for a sampling path.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a filter.
Specifies the name of a filter.
The value is a string of 1 to 8 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

ExtraInfo: When configuring a sampling path, you can specify filter criteria so that the data that meets the filter criteria can be collected and reported. Filter criteria can be configured only in the filter view. Therefore, before configuring filter criteria, run the filter command to create a filter and enter the filter view.
